description: Pipedrive is a sales management tool built around pipeline visualization, lead tracking, activity reminders, and automation to keep deals progressing

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_CALL_LOG
capabilities.description: Adds a new call log.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_CHANNEL
capabilities.description: New messaging channel added; registration limited to admins. Utilizes getConversations endpoint for data retrieval. Requires Messengers integration OAuth scope and a prepared Messaging app extension manifest.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_COMMENT_TO_A_NOTE
capabilities.description: Adds a new comment to a note.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_DEAL
capabilities.description: Add a new deal to Pipedrive with any custom fields, which vary by account and are identified by long hash keys. Check dealFields for existing custom fields. For details, visit the tutorial on adding a deal.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_FOLLOWER_TO_A_DEAL
capabilities.description: Adds a follower to a deal.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_FOLLOWER_TO_AN_ORGANIZATION
capabilities.description: Adds a follower to an organization.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_FOLLOWER_TO_A_PERSON
capabilities.description: Adds a follower to a person.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_FOLLOWER_TO_A_PRODUCT
capabilities.description: Adds a follower to a product.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_LEAD
capabilities.description: Pipedrive API lets you add leads linked to people or organizations and tags them with 'API' source. Custom fields from deals apply to leads and appear in responses if set. Details are in the tutorials for adding and updating leads.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_LEAD_LABEL
capabilities.description: Creates a lead label.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_AN_ACTIVITY
capabilities.description: New activity added. Response includes `more_activities_scheduled_in_context` to show if more are planned with the same entity. See tutorial on adding activities [here](https://pipedrive.readme.io/docs/adding-an-activity).

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_NEW_DEAL_FIELD
capabilities.description: Adds a new deal field. For more information, see the tutorial for adding a new custom field.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_NEW_FILTER
capabilities.description: New filter creation returns an ID. Only one primary condition group with 'AND' and two secondary groups (one 'AND', one 'OR') are supported. Future syntax expansion possible. See tutorial for details.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_NEW_GOAL
capabilities.description: Adds a new goal. Along with adding a new goal, a report is created to track the progress of your goal.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_NEW_ORGANIZATION_FIELD
capabilities.description: Adds a new organization field. For more information, see the tutorial for adding a new custom field.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_NEW_PERSON_FIELD
capabilities.description: Adds a new person field. For more information, see the tutorial for adding a new custom field.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_NEW_PIPELINE
capabilities.description: Adds a new pipeline (v2).

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_NEW_PRODUCT_FIELD
capabilities.description: Adds a new product field. For more information, see the tutorial for adding a new custom field.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_NEW_STAGE
capabilities.description: Adds a new stage, returns the ID upon success.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_NEW_TEAM
capabilities.description: Adds a new team to the company and returns the created object.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_NEW_USER
capabilities.description: Adds a new user to the company, returns the ID upon success.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_AN_INSTALLMENT_SUBSCRIPTION
capabilities.description: Adds a new installment subscription. Note: Subscriptions endpoints may not be available on the company-specific base URL. To avoid 404s, this action overrides the default request behavior and uses the public API host (api.pipedrive.com) explicitly.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_AN_ORGANIZATION
capabilities.description: Set up a new Pipedrive organization using custom fields with unique key hashes. Retrieve `organizationFields` for configuration. Check the linked tutorial for guidance.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_NOTE
capabilities.description: Add a note to a deal, person, organization, lead, or project in Pipedrive. At least one of deal_id, person_id, org_id, lead_id, or project_id must be provided.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_PARTICIPANT_TO_A_DEAL
capabilities.description: Adds a participant to a deal.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_PERSON
capabilities.description: Add a new contact in Pipedrive with optional custom fields unique to each account found using the `personFields` endpoint. The endpoint also handles `data.marketing_status` for Campaigns product users.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_PRODUCT
capabilities.description: Adds a new product to the Products inventory. For more information, see the tutorial for adding a product.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_PRODUCT_TO_A_DEAL
capabilities.description: Adds a product to a deal, creating a new item called a deal-product.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_PROJECT
capabilities.description: Adds a new project. Note that you can supply additional custom fields along with the request that are not described here. These custom fields are different for each Pipedrive account and can be recognized by long hashes as keys.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_RECURRING_SUBSCRIPTION
capabilities.description: Adds a new recurring subscription.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_ROLE
capabilities.description: Adds a new role. Note: - Roles endpoints require the `admin` scope. - For OAuth tokens, Pipedrive expects the company domain base URL with `/api/v1` path. Example: https://{COMPANY}.pipedrive.com/api/v1/roles - This action normalizes the base_url provided by metadata to ensure `/api/v1` is used.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_A_TASK
capabilities.description: Adds a new task.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_FILE
capabilities.description: Upload and link files to deals, people, organizations, activities, products, or leads in Pipedrive. See the "adding a file" tutorial for details.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_NEW_ACTIVITY_TYPE
capabilities.description: Adds a new activity type.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_OR_UPDATE_ROLE_SETTING
capabilities.description: Adds or updates the visibility setting for a role. Notes: - Roles endpoints require the `admin` OAuth scope. - OAuth calls must target the company domain with `/api/v1` path, e.g., https://{COMPANY}.pipedrive.com/api/v1/roles/{id}/settings - This action normalizes the base URL accordingly.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_PERSON_PICTURE
capabilities.description: This service allows adding a photo to a person's profile, replacing any existing one. Images must be square with a minimum size of 128 pixels and in GIF, JPG, or PNG formats. They will be resized to 128 and 512 pixels.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_ROLE_ASSIGNMENT
capabilities.description: Assigns a user to a role. Notes: - Roles endpoints require the `admin` OAuth scope. - OAuth calls must target the company domain with `/api/v1` path, e.g., https://{COMPANY}.pipedrive.com/api/v1/roles/{id}/assignments - This action normalizes the base URL accordingly and ensures JSON body is sent.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ADD_USERS_TO_A_TEAM
capabilities.description: Adds users to an existing team.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ARCHIVE_A_PROJECT
capabilities.description: Archives a project.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ATTACH_AN_AUDIO_FILE_TO_THE_CALL_LOG
capabilities.description: Adds an audio recording to the call log. That audio can be played by those who have access to the call log object.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_CANCEL_A_RECURRING_SUBSCRIPTION
capabilities.description: Cancels a recurring subscription. This action attempts to cancel a recurring subscription via Subscriptions API. If Subscriptions endpoints are unavailable (404), it gracefully falls back to disabling all product attachments on the given deal (interpreting `id` as `deal_id`) to mimic cancellation behavior.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_CREATE_A_NEW_WEBHOOK
capabilities.description: Creates and returns details of a new Webhook. Trigger events combine `event_action` and `event_object`, like `*.*` for all events or `added.deal`, `deleted.persons` for specific actions. More info in the Webhooks guide.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_CREATE_AN_ORGANIZATION_RELATIONSHIP
capabilities.description: Creates and returns an organization relationship.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_CREATE_A_REMOTE_FILE_AND_LINK_IT_TO_AN_ITEM
capabilities.description: Creates an empty file on Google Drive linked to an item. For details, refer to the Pipedrive remote file adding tutorial.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_CALL_LOG
capabilities.description: Deletes a call log. If there is an audio recording attached to it, it will also be deleted. The related activity will not be removed by this request. If you want to remove the related activities, please use the endpoint which is specific for activities.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_CHANNEL
capabilities.description: The endpoint removes a messenger channel along with conversations and messages. Requires Messengers integration OAuth and Messaging app extension manifest.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_COMMENT_RELATED_TO_A_NOTE
capabilities.description: Deletes a comment.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_CONVERSATION
capabilities.description: Deletes an existing conversation. To use the endpoint, you need to have **Messengers integration** OAuth scope enabled and the Messaging manifest ready for the [Messaging app extension](https://pipedrive.readme.io/docs/messaging-app-extension).

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_DEAL
capabilities.description: Marks a deal as deleted. After 30 days, the deal will be permanently deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_DEAL_FIELD
capabilities.description: Marks a field as deleted. For more information, see the tutorial for deleting a custom field.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_FILE
capabilities.description: Marks a file as deleted. After 30 days, the file will be permanently deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_FILTER
capabilities.description: Marks a filter as deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_FOLLOWER_FROM_A_DEAL
capabilities.description: Deletes a follower from a deal.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_FOLLOWER_FROM_AN_ORGANIZATION
capabilities.description: Deletes a follower from an organization. You can retrieve the `follower_id` from the List followers of an organization endpoint.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_FOLLOWER_FROM_A_PERSON
capabilities.description: Deletes a follower from a person.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_FOLLOWER_FROM_A_PRODUCT
capabilities.description: Deletes a follower from a product.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_LEAD
capabilities.description: Deletes a specific lead.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_LEAD_LABEL
capabilities.description: Deletes a specific lead label.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_AN_ACTIVITY
capabilities.description: Marks an activity as deleted. After 30 days, the activity will be permanently deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_AN_ACTIVITY_TYPE
capabilities.description: Marks an activity type as deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_AN_ATTACHED_PRODUCT_FROM_A_DEAL
capabilities.description: Deletes a product attachment from a deal, using the `product_attachment_id`.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_AN_ORGANIZATION
capabilities.description: Marks an organization as deleted. After 30 days, the organization will be permanently deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_AN_ORGANIZATION_FIELD
capabilities.description: Marks a field as deleted. For more information, see the tutorial for deleting a custom field.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_AN_ORGANIZATION_RELATIONSHIP
capabilities.description: Deletes an organization relationship and returns the deleted ID.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_NOTE
capabilities.description: Deletes a specific note.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_PARTICIPANT_FROM_A_DEAL
capabilities.description: Deletes a participant from a deal.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_PERSON
capabilities.description: Marks a person as deleted. After 30 days, the person will be permanently deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_PERSON_FIELD
capabilities.description: Marks a field as deleted. For more information, see the tutorial for deleting a custom field.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_PIPELINE
capabilities.description: Marks a pipeline as deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_PRODUCT
capabilities.description: Marks a product as deleted. After 30 days, the product will be permanently deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_PRODUCT_FIELD
capabilities.description: Marks a product field as deleted. For more information, see the tutorial for deleting a custom field.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_PROJECT
capabilities.description: Marks a project as deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_ROLE
capabilities.description: Marks a role as deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_ROLE_ASSIGNMENT
capabilities.description: Removes the assigned user from a role and adds to the default role.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_STAGE
capabilities.description: Marks a stage as deleted. Uses the company-domain v2 endpoint.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_SUBSCRIPTION
capabilities.description: Marks an installment or a recurring subscription as deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_A_TASK
capabilities.description: Marks a task as deleted. If the task has subtasks then those will also be deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_EXISTING_GOAL
capabilities.description: Marks a goal as deleted. Notes: - Pipedrive Goals endpoints for OAuth live under `{companydomain}/api/v1`. The default base_url is usually `{companydomain}/v1`, which would yield 404. We therefore normalize the base URL to `/api/v1` before issuing the DELETE.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_EXISTING_WEBHOOK
capabilities.description: Deletes the specified Webhook.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_MAIL_THREAD
capabilities.description: Marks a mail thread as deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_MULTIPLE_ACTIVITIES_IN_BULK
capabilities.description: Marks multiple activities as deleted. After 30 days, the activities will be permanently deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_MULTIPLE_ACTIVITY_TYPES_IN_BULK
capabilities.description: Marks multiple activity types as deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_MULTIPLE_DEAL_FIELDS_IN_BULK
capabilities.description: Marks multiple deal fields as deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_MULTIPLE_DEALS_IN_BULK
capabilities.description: Marks multiple deals as deleted. After 30 days, the deals will be permanently deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_MULTIPLE_FILTERS_IN_BULK
capabilities.description: Marks multiple filters as deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_MULTIPLE_ORGANIZATION_FIELDS_IN_BULK
capabilities.description: Marks multiple fields as deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_MULTIPLE_ORGANIZATIONS_IN_BULK
capabilities.description: Marks multiple organizations as deleted. After 30 days, the organizations will be permanently deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_MULTIPLE_PERSON_FIELDS_IN_BULK
capabilities.description: Marks multiple fields as deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_MULTIPLE_PERSONS_IN_BULK
capabilities.description: Marks multiple persons as deleted. After 30 days, the persons will be permanently deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_MULTIPLE_PRODUCT_FIELDS_IN_BULK
capabilities.description: Marks multiple fields as deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_MULTIPLE_STAGES_IN_BULK
capabilities.description: Marks multiple stages as deleted (v1). Note: This endpoint may be deprecated; we keep compatibility and avoid raising to surface API errors in response.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_PERSON_PICTURE
capabilities.description: Deletes a personâ€™s picture. Note: Pipedrive may return a 400 with error "Item not found" when the person has no picture set. Since delete is idempotent, we treat this specific case as a successful no-op and return a normalized response rather than raising.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DELETE_USERS_FROM_A_TEAM
capabilities.description: Deletes users from an existing team.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DOWNLOAD_ONE_FILE
capabilities.description: Initializes a file download.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_DUPLICATE_DEAL
capabilities.description: Duplicates a deal.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_ENUMERATE_ACCESSIBLE_USERS_FOR_LEAD
capabilities.description: Lists the users permitted to access a lead.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_FIND_GOALS
capabilities.description: Query goal data by appending `{searchField}={searchValue}` to the URL with dot-notation fields and values. Include `is_active` to filter by goal status and specify both `period.start` and `period.end` for time-based searches.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_FIND_SUBSCRIPTION_BY_DEAL
capabilities.description: Returns details of an installment or a recurring subscription by the deal ID. Note: Subscriptions endpoints may not be available on company-specific hosts or may be deprecated. This action attempts multiple hosts and gracefully falls back to Installments (v2) or Deal Products (v1) to provide a useful response based on live API data.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_FIND_USERS_BY_NAME
capabilities.description: Finds users by their name.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_ACTIVITIES_ASSIGNED_TO_A_PARTICULAR_USER
capabilities.description: Returns all activities assigned to a particular user.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_ACTIVITIES_BETA
capabilities.description: This BETA cursor-paginated endpoint returns all activities, accessible only to global admins, not regular users who get a 403 error. Refer to Pipedrive's documentation for pagination and global permissions.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_ACTIVITY_FIELDS
capabilities.description: Returns all activity fields.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_ACTIVITY_TYPES
capabilities.description: Returns all activity types.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_ADD_ONS_FOR_A_SINGLE_COMPANY
capabilities.description: Returns the add-ons for a single company.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_CALL_LOGS_ASSIGNED_TO_A_PARTICULAR_USER
capabilities.description: Returns all call logs assigned to a particular user.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_COMMENTS_FOR_A_NOTE
capabilities.description: Returns all comments associated with a note.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_DEAL_FIELDS
capabilities.description: Returns data about all deal fields.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_DEALS
capabilities.description: Returns all deals. For more information, see the tutorial for getting all deals.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_DEALS_BETA
capabilities.description: This endpoint returns all deals with cursor pagination (in BETA). Only global admins can access it; others get a 403 error. More info on pagination and permissions is available online.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_FILES
capabilities.description: Returns data about all files.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_FILTER_HELPERS
capabilities.description: The text provides links to documentation for adding or updating filters, and information on all supported filter helpers in an API. It encourages consulting a tutorial for more details on adding a filter.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_FILTERS
capabilities.description: Returns data about all filters.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_LEAD_LABELS
capabilities.description: Returns details of all lead labels. This endpoint does not support pagination and all labels are always returned.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_LEADS
capabilities.description: The API returns sorted leads by creation time, supporting pagination via `limit` and `start`. Custom field values are included if set, mimicking the `Deals` endpoint structure; unset fields are omitted. Leads share custom fields with deals.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_LEAD_SOURCES
capabilities.description: Returns all lead sources. Please note that the list of lead sources is fixed, it cannot be modified. All leads created through the Pipedrive API will have a lead source `API` assigned.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_MAIL_MESSAGES_OF_MAIL_THREAD
capabilities.description: Returns all the mail messages inside a specified mail thread.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_NOTE_FIELDS
capabilities.description: Returns data about all note fields.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_NOTES
capabilities.description: Returns all notes.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_ORGANIZATION_FIELDS
capabilities.description: Returns data about all organization fields.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_ORGANIZATIONS
capabilities.description: Returns all organizations.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_ORGANIZATIONS_BETA
capabilities.description: This BETA API endpoint lists all organizations with cursor pagination. Only global admins have access; others get a 403 error. See docs for pagination and global permissions.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_PAYMENTS_OF_A_SUBSCRIPTION
capabilities.description: Returns all payments of an installment or recurring subscription.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_PERMISSION_SETS
capabilities.description: Returns data about all permission sets.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_PERSON_FIELDS
capabilities.description:
Returns data about all person fields.
If a company uses the [Campaigns product](https://pipedrive.readme.io/docs/campaigns-in-pipedrive-api), then this endpoint will also return the `data.marketing_status` field.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_PERSONS
capabilities.description: Returns all persons.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_PERSONS_BETA
capabilities.description: This BETA endpoint returns all persons, using cursor pagination. Only global admins have access; others get a 403 error. Info on pagination and permissions is in the linked docs.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_PIPELINES
capabilities.description: Returns data about all pipelines.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_PRODUCT_FIELDS
capabilities.description: Returns data about all product fields.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_PRODUCTS
capabilities.description: Returns data about all products.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_PROJECT_BOARDS
capabilities.description: Returns all projects boards that are not deleted.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_PROJECTS
capabilities.description: Returns all projects. This is a cursor-paginated endpoint. For more information, please refer to our documentation on pagination.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_PROJECT_TEMPLATES
capabilities.description: The endpoint retrieves all non-deleted project templates with cursor-based pagination. Refer to the provided documentation link for more details on pagination.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_RELATIONSHIPS_FOR_ORGANIZATION
capabilities.description: Gets all of the relationships for a supplied organization ID.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_ROLES
capabilities.description: Returns all the roles within the company. Note: - Roles endpoints require the `admin` scope. - For OAuth tokens, Pipedrive expects the company domain base URL with `/api/v1` path. Example: https://{COMPANY}.pipedrive.com/api/v1/roles - This action normalizes the base_url provided by metadata to ensure `/api/v1` is used.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_STAGES
capabilities.description: Returns data about all stages.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_SUPPORTED_CURRENCIES
capabilities.description: Returns all supported currencies in given account which should be used when saving monetary values with other objects. The `code` parameter of the returning objects is the currency code according to ISO 4217 for all non-custom currencies.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_TASKS
capabilities.description: Returns all tasks. This is a cursor-paginated endpoint. For more information, please refer to our documentation on pagination.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_TEAMS
capabilities.description: Returns data about teams within the company.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_TEAMS_OF_A_USER
capabilities.description: Returns data about all teams which have the specified user as a member.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_USER_CONNECTIONS
capabilities.description: Returns data about all connections for the authorized user.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_USERS
capabilities.description: Returns data about all users within the company.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_USERS_IN_A_TEAM
capabilities.description: Returns a list of all user IDs within a team.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ALL_WEBHOOKS
capabilities.description: Returns data about all the Webhooks of a company.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_A_SINGLE_TEAM
capabilities.description: Returns data about a specific team.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_CONVERSATIONS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve messaging conversations. Use after channel registration to sync conversations.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_CURRENT_USER_DATA
capabilities.description: Returns data about an authorized user within the company with bound company data: company ID, company name, and domain. Note that the `locale` property means 'Date/number format' in the Pipedrive account settings, not the chosen language.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DEALS_CONVERSION_RATES_IN_PIPELINE
capabilities.description: Returns all stage-to-stage conversion and pipeline-to-close rates for the given time period.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DEALS_IN_A_PIPELINE
capabilities.description: Lists deals in a specific pipeline across all its stages.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DEALS_IN_A_STAGE
capabilities.description: Lists deals in a specific stage.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DEALS_MOVEMENTS_IN_PIPELINE
capabilities.description: Returns statistics for deals movements for the given time period.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DEALS_SUMMARY
capabilities.description: Returns a summary of all the deals.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DEALS_TIMELINE
capabilities.description: Returns opened and won deals in time-based groups according to a specified dealField, with examples of deals grouped by month over a 3-month period starting January 2012.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DEALS_WHERE_A_PRODUCT_IS_ATTACHED_TO
capabilities.description: Returns data about deals that have a product attached to it.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DETAILS_OF_A_BOARD
capabilities.description: Returns the details of a specific project board.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DETAILS_OF_A_CALL_LOG
capabilities.description: Returns details of a specific call log.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DETAILS_OF_A_DEAL
capabilities.description: Fetches specific deal details, including exclusive fields like deal age and pipeline stage duration. Custom fields show up as hashes, which can be matched using the 'key' from dealFields. See the deal details tutorial for more.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DETAILS_OF_AN_ACTIVITY
capabilities.description: Returns the details of a specific activity.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DETAILS_OF_AN_ORGANIZATION
capabilities.description: Provides detailed information about an organization, including additional fields not shown when listing all organizations, and maps custom fields as long hashes to the 'key' value in organizationFields.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DETAILS_OF_A_PERSON
capabilities.description: The text describes an API endpoint that returns detailed person information, including extra fields and custom fields as hashes. It also provides `data.marketing_status` if the Campaigns product is used.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DETAILS_OF_A_PHASE
capabilities.description: Returns the details of a specific project phase.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DETAILS_OF_A_PROJECT
capabilities.description: Returns the details of a specific project. Also note that custom fields appear as long hashes in the resulting data. These hashes can be mapped against the `key` value of project fields.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DETAILS_OF_A_SUBSCRIPTION
capabilities.description: Returns details of an installment or a recurring subscription. Note: Subscriptions endpoints may not be available on the company-specific base URL. To avoid 404s, this action tries multiple hosts and gracefully falls back to Installments (v2) and Deal Products (v1).

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DETAILS_OF_A_TASK
capabilities.description: Returns the details of a specific task.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_DETAILS_OF_A_TEMPLATE
capabilities.description: Returns the details of a specific project template.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_MAIL_THREADS
capabilities.description: Returns mail threads in a specified folder ordered by the most recent message within.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_MARKETPLACE_CLIENT_ID
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve marketplace_client_id of an installed video integration. Use when you need the client ID for an installed integration.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Returns the details of a comment.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_DEAL_FIELD
capabilities.description: Returns data about a specific deal field.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_FILE
capabilities.description: Returns data about a specific file.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_FILTER
capabilities.description: Returns data about a specific filter. Note that this also returns the condition lines of the filter.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_LEAD
capabilities.description: API returns specific lead details with custom field values in the Deals format. Unset custom fields are omitted. Leads share custom fields with deals, not having a unique set.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_MAIL_MESSAGE
capabilities.description: Returns data about a specific mail message.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_MAIL_THREAD
capabilities.description: Returns a specific mail thread.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_NOTE
capabilities.description: Returns details about a specific note.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_ORGANIZATION_FIELD
capabilities.description: Returns data about a specific organization field.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_ORGANIZATION_RELATIONSHIP
capabilities.description: Finds and returns an organization relationship from its ID.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_PERMISSION_SET
capabilities.description: Returns data about a specific permission set.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_PERSON_FIELD
capabilities.description: Returns data about a specific person field.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_PIPELINE
capabilities.description: Returns data about a specific pipeline. Also returns the summary of the deals in this pipeline across its stages.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_PRODUCT
capabilities.description: Returns data about a specific product.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_PRODUCT_FIELD
capabilities.description: Returns data about a specific product field.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_ROLE
capabilities.description: Returns the details of a specific role. Note: - Roles endpoints require the `admin` scope. - For OAuth tokens, Pipedrive expects the company domain base URL with `/api/v1` path. Example: https://{COMPANY}.pipedrive.com/api/v1/roles/{id} - This action normalizes the provided base_url to use `/api/v1` to avoid host/path mismatches.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_STAGE
capabilities.description: Returns data about a specific stage.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_ONE_USER
capabilities.description: Returns data about a specific user within the company.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_PROJECT_PHASES
capabilities.description: Returns all active project phases under a specific board.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_RECENTS
capabilities.description: Returns data about all recent changes occurred after the given timestamp.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_RESULT_OF_A_GOAL
capabilities.description: Gets the progress of a goal for the specified period.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_GET_TEMPLATES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve message templates for a channel. Use when template support is enabled.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_LINK_A_REMOTE_FILE_TO_AN_ITEM
capabilities.description: Links an existing remote file (`googledrive`) to the item you supply. For more information, see the tutorial for adding a remote file.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_LINK_USER_VIDEO_INTEGRATION
capabilities.description: A video calling provider must call this endpoint after a user has installed the video calling app so that the new user's information is sent.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_LIST_ACTIVITIES_ASSOCIATED_WITH_A_DEAL
capabilities.description: Lists activities associated with a deal.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_LIST_ACTIVITIES_ASSOCIATED_WITH_AN_ORGANIZATION
capabilities.description: Lists activities associated with an organization.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_LIST_ACTIVITIES_ASSOCIATED_WITH_A_PERSON
capabilities.description: Lists activities associated with a person.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_LIST_ALL_PERSONS_ASSOCIATED_WITH_A_DEAL
capabilities.description: The endpoint lists every person linked to a deal, including primary contacts and participants, and provides a `data.marketing_status` field for users of the Campaigns product.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_LIST_DEALS_ASSOCIATED_WITH_AN_ORGANIZATION
capabilities.description: Lists deals associated with an organization.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_LIST_DEALS_ASSOCIATED_WITH_A_PERSON
capabilities.description: Lists deals associated with a person.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_LIST_FILES_ATTACHED_TO_A_DEAL
capabilities.description: Lists files associated with a deal.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_LIST_FILES_ATTACHED_TO_AN_ORGANIZATION
capabilities.description: Lists files associated with an organization.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_LIST_FILES_ATTACHED_TO_A_PERSON
capabilities.description: Lists files associated with a person.

capabilities.name: PIPEDRIVE_LIST_FILES_ATTACHED_TO_A_PRODUCT
capabilities.description: Lists files associated with a product.
